txt.en:
'Interested in taking a look at the true Mines of Moria now, are you? I can't blame you, for tales speak of their wonder and beauty!

'What I wouldn't give to have gone with the dwarves who went to the Silvertine Lodes... but I have a job here, and I mean to do it!

'Take the south path from the Dolven-view and you will find yourself at the Deep Descent in no time -- it is really quite close. You might be able to help the dwarves there quite as much as you helped us!'

'Welcome to the Deep Descent, [placeholder]! We miners have great hopes for the Silvertine Lodes.\n\n'Are you here to look for ways to be of use? Never fret... there is more to be done here than we can handle!'
'You should speak with Thettmárr at the Deep Descent encampment as soon as you feel ready to take your leave.'
There is much work to be done for the Longbeards to reclaim their ancient home of Moria.
Talk to Thettmárr at the Deep Descent
The Deep Descent is along the south path from the Dolven-view, at the north edge of the Silvertine Lodes.\n\nYou should take the path south to discover the dwarf-hub at the Deep Descent.
